tool.name: COMET
tool.command: ###Default /bin/cometsc.sh bmsnkn_5x100cells 2 0.15 2 True True 5 \t tar -xvf $tar -C /scratch && /bin/cometsc.sh annotated_matrix $threads $X $K $counts $skipvis $nCluster $Separator 2>$log && mkdir -p ${html_file.files_path} && tar -zcvf zipOutput.tar.gz -C /scratch/ . 2>>$log && cp -R /scratch/* ${html_file.extra_files_path} && bash $__tool_directory__/files.sh $html_file.extra_files_path $html_file

param.name: threads
param.help: number of cores to use in this machine

param.name: K
param.label: number of gene combination to be considered
param.help: Select genome index from the list

param.name: counts
param.label: if set to True it will graph the log(expression+1

param.name: skipvis
param.label: if set to True it will graph the log(expression+1
